mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(importTime,'%Y-%m') timeByYear, SUM(number) AS numberByYear FROM bus_import WHERE importTime>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY timeByYear
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(number),0) AS number FROM bus_import WHERE TO_DAYS(importTime) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
SELECT SUM(im.number) AS value, gs.goodsName AS name FROM bus_import im LEFT JOIN bus_goods gs ON im.goodsId = gs.id GROUP BY im.goodsId
